item.description:
Wed, June 27th at The Incredible Pulp: 'CHAOS' Magic the Gathering Booster Draft

Each player gets 3 packs at random to draft with in the order they choose. All Standard-legal sets will be utilized.

The event starts @ 6:30 pm and the entry fee= $16.00 (Mirrodin Besieged and New Phyrex packs are a little pricier, but each player is guaranteed that one of their packs will come from either of these sets).

3 Rounds, with a pack won for each round won.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: CHAOS Mtg Booster Draft!
